trans-unit.source: An `abstract` base class representing a comparison that can be used to constrain an <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref>.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> is the abstract base class from which <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> is derived.

<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> is evaluated by comparing the value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition"></xref> class.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the name of the member whose value will be compared.

The value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> will be compared to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
The name of the member to be compared.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the operator to use in the comparison.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the value to compare.

<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> will be compared to the value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> by applying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
